benchmark_details.name: Benchmarking Vision-Language and Multimodal Large Language Models in Zero-Shot and Few-Shot Scenarios: A Study on Christian Iconography
benchmark_details.overview: This study evaluates the capabilities of Multimodal Large Language Models and Vision Language Models in the task of single-label classification of Christian Iconography, focusing on zero-shot and few-shot settings across curated datasets.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To benchmark the performance of multimodal LLMs and VLMs for the classification of Christian iconography.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: This study focuses on classifying single-labeled images with a limited number of classes; it does not reflect real-world scenarios.

data.annotation: Annotated with Iconclass codes and descriptions.

methodology.calculation: Model accuracy is calculated based on the number of correct predictions over the total predictions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in classifying images accurately.
methodology.baseline_results: ResNet50 achieved 84.44% accuracy as the baseline.
